description:
The Information Commissioner’s Office (ICO), the UK authority in charge of overseeing the use and collecting of personal data, has revealed that it received reports on more than 3,000 cyber breaches in 2023.  This figure highlights an urgent concern in the world of technology: the need for strong data protection measures, particularly in the development of AI technologies. The UK’s data... Read more »

The post UK authority calls for integral data protection in AI amid increasing breaches appeared first on Developer Tech News
title: UK authority calls for integral data protection in AI amid increasing breaches
